[[Andrew]] (boyfriend) | actor = [[Sofia Milos]] }} '''Aurora''' was an Italian former Israeli soldier who dated [[Chandler Bing|Chandler]] in "[[The One With The Butt]]", portrayed by [[Sofia Milos]]. She dated Chandler despite the fact that she was married to a man named [[Rick (Aroura's husband)|Rick]], and also had a boyfriend, [[Ethan]], on the side. Although Chandler was initially content with this because of how incredible Aurora was, when she picked up yet another boyfriend, [[Andrew]], Chandler decided to call it off.
